description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing aviatrix cloud resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`aviatrix` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/AviatrixSystems/terraform-provider-aviatrix).

provider.description:
The provider type for the aviatrix package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

awsSideAsNumber.description: BGP Local ASN (Autonomous System Number), Integer between 1-4294967294.

cloudType.description: Type of cloud service provider, requires an integer value. Supported for AWS (1) and AWS GOV (256). Default value: 1.

manageSecurityDomain.description:
This parameter is a switch used to determine whether or not to manage security domains to the TGW using the
aviatrix_aws_tgw resource. If this is set to false, security domains must be managed using the
aviatrix_aws_tgw_security_domain resource. Valid values: true, false. Default value: true.

manageTransitGatewayAttachment.description:
This parameter is a switch used to determine whether or not to manage transit gateway attachments to the TGW using the
aviatrix_aws_tgw resource. If this is set to false, attachment of transit gateways must be done using the
aviatrix_aws_tgw_transit_gateway_attachment resource. Valid values: true, false. Default value: true.

manageVpcAttachment.description:
This parameter is a switch used to determine whether or not to manage VPC attachments to the TGW using the
aviatrix_aws_tgw resource. If this is set to false, attachment of VPCs must be done using the
aviatrix_aws_tgw_vpc_attachment resource. Valid values: true, false. Default value: true.

customizedRouteAdvertisement.description: Advanced option. Customized route(s) to be advertised to other VPCs that are connected to the same TGW.

customizedRoutes.description:
Advanced option. Customized Spoke VPC Routes. It allows the admin to enter non-RFC1918 routes in the VPC route table
targeting the TGW.

disableLocalRoutePropagation.description:
Advanced option. If set to true, it disables automatic route propagation of this VPC to other VPCs within the same
network domain.

edgeAttachment.description:
Edge attachment ID. To allow access to the private IP of the MGMT interface of the Firewalls, set this attribute to
enable Management Access From Onprem. This feature advertises the Firewalls private MGMT subnet to your Edge domain.

networkDomainName.description: The name of the network domain.

routeTables.description:
Advanced option. Route tables separated by ',' to participate in TGW Orchestrator, i.e., learned routes will be
propagated to these route tables.

securityDomainName.description: The name of the security domain.

subnets.description:
Advanced option. VPC subnets separated by ',' to attach to the VPC. If left blank, Aviatrix Controller automatically
selects a subnet representing each AZ for the VPC attachment.

connectionType.description:
Connection type. Valid values: 'dynamic', 'static'. 'dynamic' stands for a BGP VPN connection; 'static' stands for a
static VPN connection. Default value: 'dynamic'.

enableLearnedCidrsApproval.description: Switch to enable/disable encrypted transit approval for vpn connection. Valid values: true, false.

insideIpCidrTun1.description: Inside IP CIDR for Tunnel 1. A /30 CIDR in 169.254.0.0/16.

insideIpCidrTun2.description: Inside IP CIDR for Tunnel 2. A /30 CIDR in 169.254.0.0/16.

preSharedKeyTun1.description: Pre-Shared Key for Tunnel 1. A 8-64 character string with alphanumeric, underscore(_) and dot(.). It cannot start with 0

preSharedKeyTun2.description: Pre-Shared Key for Tunnel 2. A 8-64 character string with alphanumeric, underscore(_) and dot(.). It cannot start with 0

remoteAsNumber.description: AWS side as a number. Integer between 1-4294967294. Example: '12'. Required for a dynamic VPN connection.

remoteCidr.description: Remote CIDRs joined as a string with ','. Required for a static VPN connection.

routeDomainName.description: The name of a route domain, to which the vpn will be attached.

tgwName.description: This parameter represents the name of an AWS TGW.

connectionType.description:
Connection type. Valid values: 'dynamic', 'static'. 'dynamic' stands for a BGP VPN connection; 'static' stands for a
static VPN connection. Default value: 'dynamic'.

allocateNewEip.description:
If false, reuse an idle address in Elastic IP pool for this gateway. Otherwise, allocate a new Elastic IP and use it for
this gateway.

approvedLearnedCidrs.description: Approved learned CIDRs for BGP Spoke Gateway. Available as of provider version R2.21+.

azureEipNameResourceGroup.description: The name of the public IP address and its resource group in Azure to assign to this Spoke Gateway.

bgpEcmp.description: Enable Equal Cost Multi Path (ECMP) routing for the next hop for BGP Spoke Gateway.

bgpHoldTime.description: BGP Hold Time for BGP Spoke Gateway. Unit is in seconds. Valid values are between 12 and 360.

bgpPollingTime.description: BGP route polling time for BGP Spoke Gateway. Unit is in seconds. Valid values are between 10 and 50.

customizedSpokeVpcRoutes.description:
A list of comma separated CIDRs to be customized for the spoke VPC routes. When configured, it will replace all learned
routes in VPC routing tables, including RFC1918 and non-RFC1918 CIDRs. It applies to this spoke gateway only.

disableRoutePropagation.description: Disables route propagation on BGP Spoke to attached Transit Gateway. Default: false.

eip.description: Required when allocate_new_eip is false. It uses specified EIP for this gateway.

enableActiveStandby.description: Enables Active-Standby Mode, available only with HA enabled for BGP Spoke Gateway.

enableActiveStandbyPreemptive.description: Enables Preemptive Mode for Active-Standby, available only with Active-Standby enabled.

enableAutoAdvertiseS2cCidrs.description: Automatically advertise remote CIDR to Aviatrix Transit Gateway when route based Site2Cloud Tunnel is created.

enableEncryptVolume.description: Enable encrypt gateway EBS volume. Only supported for AWS provider. Valid values: true, false. Default value: false.

enableJumboFrame.description: Enable jumbo frame support for spoke gateway. Valid values: true or false. Default value: true.

enableLearnedCidrsApproval.description: Switch to enable/disable learned CIDR approval for BGP Spoke Gateway. Valid values: true, false.

enableMonitorGatewaySubnets.description:
Enable [monitor gateway subnets](https://docs.aviatrix.com/HowTos/gateway.html#monitor-gateway-subnet). Only valid for
cloud_type = 1 (AWS) or 256 (AWSGov). Valid values: true, false. Default value: false.

enablePreserveAsPath.description: Enable preserve as_path when advertising manual summary cidrs on BGP spoke gateway.

enableSpotInstance.description: Enable spot instance. NOT supported for production deployment.

enableVpcDnsServer.description: Enable vpc_dns_server for Gateway. Valid values: true, false.

filteredSpokeVpcRoutes.description:
A list of comma separated CIDRs to be filtered from the spoke VPC route table. When configured, filtering CIDR(s) or
its subnet will be deleted from VPC routing tables as well as from spoke gateways routing table. It applies to
this spoke gateway only.

gwName.description: Name of the gateway which is going to be created.

haAzureEipNameResourceGroup.description: The name of the public IP address and its resource group in Azure to assign to the HA Spoke Gateway.

haCloudInstanceId.description: Cloud instance ID of HA spoke gateway.

haEip.description: Public IP address that you want assigned to the HA Spoke Gateway.

haGwName.description: Aviatrix spoke gateway unique name of HA spoke gateway.

haImageVersion.description:
ha_image_version can be used to set the desired image version of the HA gateway. If set, we will attempt to update the
gateway to the specified version.

haInsaneModeAz.description:
AZ of subnet being created for Insane Mode Spoke HA Gateway. Required for AWS if insane_mode is true and ha_subnet is
set.

haPrivateIp.description: Private IP address of the spoke gateway created.

haPrivateModeSubnetZone.description: Private Mode HA subnet availability zone.

haPublicIp.description: Public IP address of the HA Spoke Gateway.

haSecurityGroupId.description: HA security group used for the spoke gateway.

haSoftwareVersion.description:
ha_software_version can be used to set the desired software version of the HA gateway. If set, we will attempt to update
the gateway to the specified version. If left blank, the gateway software version will continue to be managed through
the aviatrix_controller_config resource.

haSubnet.description:
HA Subnet. Required if enabling HA for AWS/AWSGov/AWSChina/Azure/AzureChina/OCI/Alibaba Cloud. Optional if enabling HA
for GCP.

haZone.description: HA Zone. Required if enabling HA for GCP. Optional for Azure.

imageVersion.description:
image_version can be used to set the desired image version of the gateway. If set, we will attempt to update the gateway
to the specified version.

includedAdvertisedSpokeRoutes.description:
A list of comma separated CIDRs to be advertised to on-prem as 'Included CIDR List'. When configured, it will replace
all advertised routes from this VPC.

insaneMode.description:
Enable Insane Mode for Spoke Gateway. Valid values: true, false. Supported for AWS/AWSGov, GCP, Azure and OCI. If insane
mode is enabled, gateway size has to at least be c5 size for AWS and Standard_D3_v2 size for Azure.

insaneModeAz.description: AZ of subnet being created for Insane Mode Spoke Gateway. Required if insane_mode is enabled for AWS cloud.

learnedCidrsApprovalMode.description:
Set the learned CIDRs approval mode for BGP Spoke Gateway. Only valid when 'enable_learned_cidrs_approval' is set to
true. Currently, only 'gateway' is supported: learned CIDR approval applies to ALL connections. Default value:
'gateway'.

localAsNumber.description: Changes the Aviatrix BGP Spoke Gateway ASN number before you setup Aviatrix BGP Spoke Gateway connection configurations.

manageTransitGatewayAttachment.description:
This parameter is a switch used to determine whether or not to manage attaching this spoke gateway to transit gateways
using the aviatrix_spoke_gateway resource. If this is set to false, attaching this spoke gateway to transit gateways
must be done using the aviatrix_spoke_transit_attachment resource. Valid values: true, false. Default value: true.

monitorExcludeLists.description: A set of monitored instance ids. Only valid when 'enable_monitor_gateway_subnets' = true.

prependAsPaths.description:
List of AS numbers to populate BGP AP_PATH field when it advertises to VGW or peer devices. Only valid for BGP Spoke
Gateway

privateIp.description: Private IP address of the spoke gateway created.

privateModeLbVpcId.description: Private Mode controller load balancer vpc_id. Required when private mode is enabled for the Controller.

privateModeSubnetZone.description: Subnet availability zone. Required when Private Mode is enabled on the Controller and cloud_type is AWS.

publicIp.description: Public IP address of the Spoke Gateway created.

rxQueueSize.description: Gateway ethernet interface RX queue size. Supported for AWS related clouds only.

securityGroupId.description: Security group used for the spoke gateway.

singleAzHa.description: Set to 'enabled' if this feature is desired.

singleIpSnat.description: Specify whether to enable Source NAT feature in 'single_ip' mode on the gateway or not.

softwareVersion.description:
software_version can be used to set the desired software version of the gateway. If set, we will attempt to update the
gateway to the specified version. If left blank, the gateway software version will continue to be managed through the
aviatrix_controller_config resource.

spokeBgpManualAdvertiseCidrs.description: Intended CIDR list to be advertised to external BGP router.

spotPrice.description: Price for spot instance. NOT supported for production deployment.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the spoke gateway.

transitGw.description:
Specify the transit Gateways to attach to this spoke. Format is a comma-separated list of transit gateway names. For
example, 'transit-gw1,transit-gw2'.
transitGw.deprecationMessage: Please set `manage_transit_gateway_attachment` to false, and use the standalone aviatrix_spoke_transit_attachment resource instead.

tunnelDetectionTime.description: The IPSec tunnel down detection time for the Spoke Gateway.

zone.description: Availability Zone. Only available for cloud_type = 8 (Azure). Must be in the form 'az-n', for example, 'az-2'.

accountName.description: This parameter represents the name of a Cloud-Account in Aviatrix controller.

allocateNewEip.description:
If false, reuse an idle address in Elastic IP pool for this gateway. Otherwise, allocate a new Elastic IP and use it for
this gateway.

approvedLearnedCidrs.description: Approved learned CIDRs for BGP Spoke Gateway. Available as of provider version R2.21+.

azureEipNameResourceGroup.description: The name of the public IP address and its resource group in Azure to assign to this Spoke Gateway.

bgpEcmp.description: Enable Equal Cost Multi Path (ECMP) routing for the next hop for BGP Spoke Gateway.

bgpHoldTime.description: BGP Hold Time for BGP Spoke Gateway. Unit is in seconds. Valid values are between 12 and 360.

bgpPollingTime.description: BGP route polling time for BGP Spoke Gateway. Unit is in seconds. Valid values are between 10 and 50.

customizedSpokeVpcRoutes.description:
A list of comma separated CIDRs to be customized for the spoke VPC routes. When configured, it will replace all learned
routes in VPC routing tables, including RFC1918 and non-RFC1918 CIDRs. It applies to this spoke gateway only.

disableRoutePropagation.description: Disables route propagation on BGP Spoke to attached Transit Gateway. Default: false.

eip.description: Required when allocate_new_eip is false. It uses specified EIP for this gateway.

enableActiveStandby.description: Enables Active-Standby Mode, available only with HA enabled for BGP Spoke Gateway.

enableActiveStandbyPreemptive.description: Enables Preemptive Mode for Active-Standby, available only with Active-Standby enabled.

enableAutoAdvertiseS2cCidrs.description: Automatically advertise remote CIDR to Aviatrix Transit Gateway when route based Site2Cloud Tunnel is created.

enableEncryptVolume.description: Enable encrypt gateway EBS volume. Only supported for AWS provider. Valid values: true, false. Default value: false.

enableJumboFrame.description: Enable jumbo frame support for spoke gateway. Valid values: true or false. Default value: true.

enableLearnedCidrsApproval.description: Switch to enable/disable learned CIDR approval for BGP Spoke Gateway. Valid values: true, false.

enableMonitorGatewaySubnets.description:
Enable [monitor gateway subnets](https://docs.aviatrix.com/HowTos/gateway.html#monitor-gateway-subnet). Only valid for
cloud_type = 1 (AWS) or 256 (AWSGov). Valid values: true, false. Default value: false.

enablePreserveAsPath.description: Enable preserve as_path when advertising manual summary cidrs on BGP spoke gateway.

enableSpotInstance.description: Enable spot instance. NOT supported for production deployment.

enableVpcDnsServer.description: Enable vpc_dns_server for Gateway. Valid values: true, false.

filteredSpokeVpcRoutes.description:
A list of comma separated CIDRs to be filtered from the spoke VPC route table. When configured, filtering CIDR(s) or
its subnet will be deleted from VPC routing tables as well as from spoke gateways routing table. It applies to
this spoke gateway only.

gwName.description: Name of the gateway which is going to be created.

haAzureEipNameResourceGroup.description: The name of the public IP address and its resource group in Azure to assign to the HA Spoke Gateway.

haEip.description: Public IP address that you want assigned to the HA Spoke Gateway.

haImageVersion.description:
ha_image_version can be used to set the desired image version of the HA gateway. If set, we will attempt to update the
gateway to the specified version.

haInsaneModeAz.description:
AZ of subnet being created for Insane Mode Spoke HA Gateway. Required for AWS if insane_mode is true and ha_subnet is
set.

haPrivateModeSubnetZone.description: Private Mode HA subnet availability zone.

haSoftwareVersion.description:
ha_software_version can be used to set the desired software version of the HA gateway. If set, we will attempt to update
the gateway to the specified version. If left blank, the gateway software version will continue to be managed through
the aviatrix_controller_config resource.

haSubnet.description:
HA Subnet. Required if enabling HA for AWS/AWSGov/AWSChina/Azure/AzureChina/OCI/Alibaba Cloud. Optional if enabling HA
for GCP.

haZone.description: HA Zone. Required if enabling HA for GCP. Optional for Azure.

imageVersion.description:
image_version can be used to set the desired image version of the gateway. If set, we will attempt to update the gateway
to the specified version.

includedAdvertisedSpokeRoutes.description:
A list of comma separated CIDRs to be advertised to on-prem as 'Included CIDR List'. When configured, it will replace
all advertised routes from this VPC.

insaneMode.description:
Enable Insane Mode for Spoke Gateway. Valid values: true, false. Supported for AWS/AWSGov, GCP, Azure and OCI. If insane
mode is enabled, gateway size has to at least be c5 size for AWS and Standard_D3_v2 size for Azure.

insaneModeAz.description: AZ of subnet being created for Insane Mode Spoke Gateway. Required if insane_mode is enabled for AWS cloud.

learnedCidrsApprovalMode.description:
Set the learned CIDRs approval mode for BGP Spoke Gateway. Only valid when 'enable_learned_cidrs_approval' is set to
true. Currently, only 'gateway' is supported: learned CIDR approval applies to ALL connections. Default value:
'gateway'.

localAsNumber.description: Changes the Aviatrix BGP Spoke Gateway ASN number before you setup Aviatrix BGP Spoke Gateway connection configurations.

manageTransitGatewayAttachment.description:
This parameter is a switch used to determine whether or not to manage attaching this spoke gateway to transit gateways
using the aviatrix_spoke_gateway resource. If this is set to false, attaching this spoke gateway to transit gateways
must be done using the aviatrix_spoke_transit_attachment resource. Valid values: true, false. Default value: true.

monitorExcludeLists.description: A set of monitored instance ids. Only valid when 'enable_monitor_gateway_subnets' = true.

prependAsPaths.description:
List of AS numbers to populate BGP AP_PATH field when it advertises to VGW or peer devices. Only valid for BGP Spoke
Gateway

provider version R2.21+.

enableEdgeSegmentation.description: Switch to allow this connection to communicate with a Network Domain via Connection Policy.

enableIkev2.description: Set as true if use IKEv2.

transit_gateway's 'learned_cidrs_approval_mode' attribute be set to 'connection'. Valid values: true, false. Default
value: false. Available as of provider version R2.18+.

haEnabled.description: Set as true if there are two external devices.

localLanIp.description: Local LAN IP. Required for GCP BGP over LAN Connection.

localTunnelCidr.description: Source CIDR for the tunnel from the Aviatrix transit gateway.

manualBgpAdvertisedCidrs.description:
Configure manual BGP advertised CIDRs for this connection. Only valid with 'connection_type' = 'bgp'. Available as of
provider version R2.18+.

phase1Authentication.description: Phase one Authentication. Valid values: 'SHA-1', 'SHA-256', 'SHA-384' and 'SHA-512'.

phase1Encryption.description:
Phase one Encryption. Valid values: '3DES', 'AES-128-CBC', 'AES-192-CBC' and 'AES-256-CBC', 'AES-128-GCM-64',
'AES-128-GCM-96', 'AES-128-GCM-128', 'AES-256-GCM-64', 'AES-256-GCM-96', and 'AES-256-GCM-128'.

phase1RemoteIdentifiers.description: Phase 1 remote identifier of the IPsec tunnel.

phase2Authentication.description: Phase two Authentication. Valid values: 'NO-AUTH', 'HMAC-SHA-1', 'HMAC-SHA-256', 'HMAC-SHA-384' and 'HMAC-SHA-512'.

phase2Encryption.description:
Phase two Encryption. Valid values: '3DES', 'AES-128-CBC', 'AES-192-CBC', 'AES-256-CBC', 'AES-128-GCM-64',
'AES-128-GCM-96', 'AES-128-GCM-128', 'AES-256-GCM-64', 'AES-256-GCM-96', 'AES-256-GCM-128', and 'NULL-ENCR'.

preSharedKey.description: If left blank, the pre-shared key will be auto generated.

prependAsPaths.description: Connection AS Path Prepend customized by specifying AS PATH for a BGP connection.

remoteSubnet.description: Remote CIDRs joined as a string with ','. Required for a 'static' type connection.

cloudType.description: Type of cloud service provider, requires an integer value. Use 1 for AWS.

customizedSpokeVpcRoutes.description:
A list of comma separated CIDRs to be customized for the spoke VPC routes. When configured, it will replace all learned
routes in VPC routing tables, including RFC1918 and non-RFC1918 CIDRs. It applies to all spoke gateways attached to this
transit gateway.

customizedTransitVpcRoutes.description:
A list of CIDRs to be customized for the transit VPC routes. When configured, it will replace all learned routes in VPC
routing tables, including RFC1918 and non-RFC1918 CIDRs.To be effective, `enable_advertise_transit_cidr` or firewall
management access for a transit firenet gateway must be enabled.

eip.description: Required when allocate_new_eip is false. It uses specified EIP for this gateway.

enableActiveStandby.description: Enables Active-Standby Mode, available only with HA enabled.

enableActiveStandbyPreemptive.description: Enables Preemptive Mode for Active-Standby, available only with Active-Standby enabled.

enableAdvertiseTransitCidr.description: Switch to Enable/Disable advertise transit VPC network CIDR.

enableBgpOverLan.description:
Pre-allocate a network interface(eth4) for "BGP over LAN" functionality. Only valid for cloud_type = 4 (GCP) and 8
(Azure). Valid values: true or false. Default value: false. Available as of provider version R2.18+

enableEgressTransitFirenet.description: Specify whether to enable egress transit firenet interfaces or not.

enableEncryptVolume.description:
Enable encrypt gateway EBS volume. Only supported for AWS and AWSGov providers. Valid values: true, false. Default
value: false.

enableFirenet.description: Specify whether to enable firenet interfaces or not.

enableGatewayLoadBalancer.description:
Enable firenet interfaces with AWS Gateway Load Balancer. Only valid when `enable_firenet` or `enable_transit_firenet`
are set to true and `cloud_type` = 1 (AWS). Currently AWS Gateway Load Balancer is only supported in AWS regions
us-west-2 and us-east-1. Valid values: true or false. Default value: false.

enableHybridConnection.description: Sign of readiness for TGW connection.

enableJumboFrame.description: Enable jumbo frame support for transit gateway. Valid values: true or false. Default value: true.

enableLearnedCidrsApproval.description: Switch to enable/disable encrypted transit approval for transit Gateway. Valid values: true, false.

enableMonitorGatewaySubnets.description:
Enable [monitor gateway subnets](https://docs.aviatrix.com/HowTos/gateway.html#monitor-gateway-subnet). Only valid for
cloud_type = 1 (AWS) or 256 (AWSGov). Valid values: true, false. Default value: false.

enableMultiTierTransit.description: Enable Multi-tier Transit mode on transit gateway.

enablePreserveAsPath.description: Enable preserve as_path when advertising manual summary cidrs on transit gateway.

enableS2cRxBalancing.description: Enable S2C receive packet CPU re-balancing on transit gateway.

enableSegmentation.description: Enable segmentation to allow association of transit gateway to security domains.

enableSpotInstance.description: Enable spot instance. NOT supported for production deployment.

enableTransitFirenet.description: Specify whether to enable transit firenet interfaces or not.

enableVpcDnsServer.description: Enable vpc_dns_server for Gateway. Valid values: true, false.

excludedAdvertisedSpokeRoutes.description:
A list of comma separated CIDRs to be advertised to on-prem as 'Excluded CIDR List'. When configured, it inspects all
the advertised CIDRs from its spoke gateways and remove those included in the 'Excluded CIDR List'.

filteredSpokeVpcRoutes.description:
A list of comma separated CIDRs to be filtered from the spoke VPC route table. When configured, filtering CIDR(s) or
its subnet will be deleted from VPC routing tables as well as from spoke gateways routing table. It applies to all
spoke gateways attached to this transit gateway.

on a per connection basis. When configuring per connection, use the enable_learned_cidrs_approval attribute within the
connection resource to toggle learned CIDR approval. Valid values: 'gateway' or 'connection'. Default value: 'gateway'.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering AviatrixTransitGateway resources.

accountName.description: This parameter represents the name of a Cloud-Account in Aviatrix controller.

allocateNewEip.description:
If false, reuse an idle address in Elastic IP pool for this gateway. Otherwise, allocate a new Elastic IP and use it for
this gateway.

approvedLearnedCidrs.description: Approved learned CIDRs. Available as of provider version R2.21+.

azureEipNameResourceGroup.description: The name of the public IP address and its resource group in Azure to assign to this Transit Gateway.

bgpEcmp.description: Enable Equal Cost Multi Path (ECMP) routing for the next hop.

bgpLanInterfaces.description:
Interfaces to run BGP protocol on top of the ethernet interface, to connect to the onprem/remote peer. Only available
for GCP Transit.

bgpLanInterfacesCount.description: Number of interfaces that will be created for BGP over LAN enabled Azure transit.

bgpLanIpLists.description:
List of available BGP LAN interface IPs for transit external device connection creation. Only supports GCP and Azure.
Available as of provider version R2.21.0+.

bgpManualSpokeAdvertiseCidrs.description: Intended CIDR list to be advertised to external bgp router.

bgpPollingTime.description: BGP route polling time. Unit is in seconds. Valid values are between 10 and 50.

cloudInstanceId.description: Instance ID of the transit gateway.

cloudType.description: Type of cloud service provider, requires an integer value. Use 1 for AWS.

customizedSpokeVpcRoutes.description:
A list of comma separated CIDRs to be customized for the spoke VPC routes. When configured, it will replace all learned
routes in VPC routing tables, including RFC1918 and non-RFC1918 CIDRs. It applies to all spoke gateways attached to this
transit gateway.

customizedTransitVpcRoutes.description:
A list of CIDRs to be customized for the transit VPC routes. When configured, it will replace all learned routes in VPC
routing tables, including RFC1918 and non-RFC1918 CIDRs.To be effective, `enable_advertise_transit_cidr` or firewall
management access for a transit firenet gateway must be enabled.

eip.description: Required when allocate_new_eip is false. It uses specified EIP for this gateway.

enableActiveStandby.description: Enables Active-Standby Mode, available only with HA enabled.

enableActiveStandbyPreemptive.description: Enables Preemptive Mode for Active-Standby, available only with Active-Standby enabled.

enableAdvertiseTransitCidr.description: Switch to Enable/Disable advertise transit VPC network CIDR.

enableBgpOverLan.description:
Pre-allocate a network interface(eth4) for "BGP over LAN" functionality. Only valid for cloud_type = 4 (GCP) and 8
(Azure). Valid values: true or false. Default value: false. Available as of provider version R2.18+

enableEgressTransitFirenet.description: Specify whether to enable egress transit firenet interfaces or not.

enableEncryptVolume.description:
Enable encrypt gateway EBS volume. Only supported for AWS and AWSGov providers. Valid values: true, false. Default
value: false.

enableFirenet.description: Specify whether to enable firenet interfaces or not.

enableGatewayLoadBalancer.description:
Enable firenet interfaces with AWS Gateway Load Balancer. Only valid when `enable_firenet` or `enable_transit_firenet`
are set to true and `cloud_type` = 1 (AWS). Currently AWS Gateway Load Balancer is only supported in AWS regions
us-west-2 and us-east-1. Valid values: true or false. Default value: false.

enableHybridConnection.description: Sign of readiness for TGW connection.

enableJumboFrame.description: Enable jumbo frame support for transit gateway. Valid values: true or false. Default value: true.

enableLearnedCidrsApproval.description: Switch to enable/disable encrypted transit approval for transit Gateway. Valid values: true, false.

enableMonitorGatewaySubnets.description:
Enable [monitor gateway subnets](https://docs.aviatrix.com/HowTos/gateway.html#monitor-gateway-subnet). Only valid for
cloud_type = 1 (AWS) or 256 (AWSGov). Valid values: true, false. Default value: false.

enableMultiTierTransit.description: Enable Multi-tier Transit mode on transit gateway.

enablePreserveAsPath.description: Enable preserve as_path when advertising manual summary cidrs on transit gateway.

enableS2cRxBalancing.description: Enable S2C receive packet CPU re-balancing on transit gateway.

enableSegmentation.description: Enable segmentation to allow association of transit gateway to security domains.

enableSpotInstance.description: Enable spot instance. NOT supported for production deployment.

enableTransitFirenet.description: Specify whether to enable transit firenet interfaces or not.

enableVpcDnsServer.description: Enable vpc_dns_server for Gateway. Valid values: true, false.

excludedAdvertisedSpokeRoutes.description:
A list of comma separated CIDRs to be advertised to on-prem as 'Excluded CIDR List'. When configured, it inspects all
the advertised CIDRs from its spoke gateways and remove those included in the 'Excluded CIDR List'.

filteredSpokeVpcRoutes.description:
A list of comma separated CIDRs to be filtered from the spoke VPC route table. When configured, filtering CIDR(s) or
its subnet will be deleted from VPC routing tables as well as from spoke gateways routing table. It applies to all
spoke gateways attached to this transit gateway.

gwName.description: Name of the gateway which is going to be created.

haAzureEipNameResourceGroup.description: The name of the public IP address and its resource group in Azure to assign to the HA Transit Gateway.

haBgpLanInterfaces.description:
Interfaces to run BGP protocol on top of the ethernet interface, to connect to the onprem/remote peer. Only available
for GCP HA Transit.

haBgpLanIpLists.description:
List of available BGP LAN interface IPs for transit external device HA connection creation. Only supports GCP and Azure.
Available as of provider version R2.21.0+.

haCloudInstanceId.description: Cloud instance ID of HA transit gateway.

haEip.description: Public IP address that you want assigned to the HA Transit Gateway.

haGwName.description: Aviatrix transit gateway unique name of HA transit gateway.

haGwSize.description: HA Gateway Size. Mandatory if HA is enabled (ha_subnet is set).

haImageVersion.description:
ha_image_version can be used to set the desired image version of the HA gateway. If set, we will attempt to update the
gateway to the specified version.

haInsaneModeAz.description:
AZ of subnet being created for Insane Mode Transit HA Gateway. Required for AWS if insane_mode is enabled and ha_subnet
is set.

haLanInterfaceCidr.description: Transit gateway lan interface cidr for the HA gateway.

haPrivateIp.description: Private IP address of HA transit gateway.

haPrivateModeSubnetZone.description: Private Mode HA subnet availability zone.

haPublicIp.description: Public IP address of the HA Transit Gateway.

haSecurityGroupId.description: HA security group used for the transit gateway.

haSoftwareVersion.description:
ha_software_version can be used to set the desired software version of the HA gateway. If set, we will attempt to update
the gateway to the specified version. If left blank, the gateway software version will continue to be managed through
the aviatrix_controller_config resource.

haSubnet.description:
HA Subnet. Required for enabling HA for AWS/AWSGov/AWSChina/Azure/OCI/Alibaba Cloud. Optional for enabling HA for GCP
gateway.

haZone.description: HA Zone. Required if enabling HA for GCP. Optional for Azure.

imageVersion.description:
image_version can be used to set the desired image version of the gateway. If set, we will attempt to update the gateway
to the specified version.

insaneMode.description:
Enable Insane Mode for Transit. Valid values: true, false. Supported for AWS/AWSGov, GCP, Azure and OCI. If insane mode
is enabled, gateway size has to at least be c5 size for AWS and Standard_D3_v2 size for Azure.

insaneModeAz.description: AZ of subnet being created for Insane Mode Transit Gateway. Required for AWS if insane_mode is enabled.

lanPrivateSubnet.description: LAN Private Subnet. Only used for GCP Transit FireNet.

lanVpcId.description: LAN VPC ID. Only used for GCP Transit FireNet.

learnedCidrsApprovalMode.description:
Set the learned CIDRs approval mode. Only valid when 'enable_learned_cidrs_approval' is set to true. If set to
'gateway', learned CIDR approval applies to ALL connections. If set to 'connection', learned CIDR approval is configured
on a per connection basis. When configuring per connection, use the enable_learned_cidrs_approval attribute within the
connection resource to toggle learned CIDR approval. Valid values: 'gateway' or 'connection'. Default value: 'gateway'.

localAsNumber.description: Changes the Aviatrix Transit Gateway ASN number before you setup Aviatrix Transit Gateway connection configurations.

monitorExcludeLists.description: A set of monitored instance ids. Only valid when 'enable_monitor_gateway_subnets' = true.

prependAsPaths.description: List of AS numbers to populate BGP AP_PATH field when it advertises to VGW or peer devices.

privateIp.description: Private IP address of the transit gateway created.

privateModeLbVpcId.description: Private Mode Controller load balancer VPC ID. Required when private mode is enabled for the Controller.

publicIp.description: Public IP address of the Transit Gateway created.

rxQueueSize.description: Gateway ethernet interface RX queue size. Supported for AWS related clouds only.

securityGroupId.description: Security group used for the transit gateway.

singleAzHa.description: Set to 'enabled' if this feature is desired.

singleIpSnat.description: Enable or disable Source NAT feature in 'single_ip' mode for this container.

softwareVersion.description:
software_version can be used to set the desired software version of the gateway. If set, we will attempt to update the
gateway to the specified version. If left blank, the gateway software version will continue to be managed through the
aviatrix_controller_config resource.

spotPrice.description: Price for spot instance. NOT supported for production deployment.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the transit gateway.

tunnelDetectionTime.description: The IPSec tunnel down detection time for the transit gateway.

zone.description: Availability Zone. Only available for cloud_type = 8 (Azure). Must be in the form 'az-n', for example, 'az-2'.

enableInsaneModeEncryptionOverInternet.description:
(Optional) Advanced option. Enable Insane Mode Encryption over Internet. Transit gateways must be in Insane Mode.
Currently, only inter-cloud connections between AWS and Azure are supported. Required with valid `tunnel_count`.
Conflicts with `enable_peering_over_private_network` and `enable_single_tunnel_mode`. Type: Boolean. Default: false.
Available as of provider version R2.19+.

enableMaxPerformance.description:
Indicates whether the maximum amount of HPE tunnels will be created. Only valid when the two transit gateways are each
launched in Insane Mode and in the same cloud type. Available as of provider version R2.22.2+.

enablePeeringOverPrivateNetwork.description:
(Optional) Advanced option. Enable peering over private network. Only appears and applies to when the two Multi-cloud
Transit Gateways are each launched in Insane Mode and in a different cloud type. Conflicts with
`enable_insane_mode_encryption_over_internet` and `tunnel_count`. Type: Boolean. Default: false. Available in provider
version R2.17.1+

enableSingleTunnelMode.description:
(Optional) Advanced option. Enable peering with Single-Tunnel mode. Only appears and applies to when the two Multi-cloud
Transit Gateways are each launched in Insane Mode and in a different cloud type. Required with
`enable_peering_over_private_network`. Conflicts with `enable_insane_mode_encryption_over_internet` and `tunnel_count`.
Type: Boolean. Default: false. Available as of provider version R2.18+.

gateway1ExcludedTgwConnections.description: List of excluded TGW connections for the first transit gateway.

gateway2ExcludedNetworkCidrs.description: List of excluded network CIDRs for the second transit gateway.

gateway2ExcludedTgwConnections.description: List of excluded TGW connections for the second transit gateway.

prependAsPath2s.description: AS Path Prepend customized by specifying AS PATH for a BGP connection. Applies on transit_gateway_name2.

transitGatewayName2.description: The second transit gateway name to make a peer pair.

backupBgpRemoteAsNum.description: Backup BGP remote ASN (Autonomous System Number). Integer between 1-4294967294.

backupDirectConnect.description: Backup direct connect for backup external device.

backupLocalTunnelCidr.description: Source CIDR for the tunnel from the backup Aviatrix spoke gateway.

backupRemoteTunnelCidr.description: Destination CIDR for the tunnel to the backup external device.

bgpLocalAsNum.description: BGP local ASN (Autonomous System Number). Integer between 1-4294967294.

bgpRemoteAsNum.description: BGP remote ASN (Autonomous System Number). Integer between 1-4294967294.

connectionName.description: The name of the spoke external device connection which is going to be created.

connectionType.description: Connection type. Valid values: 'bgp', 'static'. Default value: 'bgp'.

customAlgorithms.description: Switch to enable custom/non-default algorithms for IPSec Authentication/Encryption.

directConnect.description: Set true for private network infrastructure.

enableIkev2.description: Set as true if use IKEv2.

enableLearnedCidrsApproval.description:
Enable learned CIDR approval for the connection. Only valid with 'connection_type' = 'bgp'. Requires the spoke_gateway's
'learned_cidrs_approval_mode' attribute be set to 'connection'. Valid values: true, false. Default value: false.

gwName.description: Name of the BGP Spoke Gateway.

haEnabled.description: Set as true if there are two external devices.

localTunnelCidr.description: Source CIDR for the tunnel from the Aviatrix spoke gateway.

manualBgpAdvertisedCidrs.description: Configure manual BGP advertised CIDRs for this connection. Only valid with 'connection_type' = 'bgp'.

phase1Authentication.description: Phase one Authentication. Valid values: 'SHA-1', 'SHA-256', 'SHA-384' and 'SHA-512'.

phase1Encryption.description:
Phase one Encryption. Valid values: '3DES', 'AES-128-CBC', 'AES-192-CBC' and 'AES-256-CBC', 'AES-128-GCM-64',
'AES-128-GCM-96', 'AES-128-GCM-128', 'AES-256-GCM-64', 'AES-256-GCM-96', and 'AES-256-GCM-128'.

phase1RemoteIdentifiers.description: Phase 1 remote identifier of the IPsec tunnel.

phase2Authentication.description: Phase two Authentication. Valid values: 'NO-AUTH', 'HMAC-SHA-1', 'HMAC-SHA-256', 'HMAC-SHA-384' and 'HMAC-SHA-512'.

phase2Encryption.description:
Phase two Encryption. Valid values: '3DES', 'AES-128-CBC', 'AES-192-CBC', 'AES-256-CBC', 'AES-128-GCM-64',
'AES-128-GCM-96', 'AES-128-GCM-128', 'AES-256-GCM-64', 'AES-256-GCM-96', 'AES-256-GCM-128', and 'NULL-ENCR'.

preSharedKey.description: If left blank, the pre-shared key will be auto generated.

prependAsPaths.description: Connection AS Path Prepend customized by specifying AS PATH for a BGP connection.

remoteSubnet.description: Remote CIDRs joined as a string with ','. Required for a 'static' type connection.

remoteTunnelCidr.description: Destination CIDR for the tunnel to the external device.

tunnelProtocol.description: Tunnel Protocol. Valid value: 'IPsec'. Default value: 'IPsec'. Case insensitive.

vpcId.description: ID of the VPC where the BGP Spoke Gateway is located.
